wikipedia_page.main: Colin James Brazier (born 6 June 1957) is an English former professional footballer who played as a defender in the Football League for Wolverhampton Wanderers, Birmingham City, Lincoln City and Walsall, and in the North American Soccer League for the Jacksonville Tea Men.

response: Colin Brazier (born 28 March 1968) is an English journalist and presenter for GB News, having previously worked for Sky News between 1997 and 2021. He presented Sky News Today on the channel alongside Jayne Secker since September 2014, but he presented a number of other programmes on the channel. Between 2005 and 2011, Brazier presented Saturday Live on the channel. In February 2021, it was announced that Brazier was leaving Sky News for GB News. He currently hosts a Monday-Thursday programme named Brazier which airs from 4-6PM GMT.
